_instructions.purpose: About page template with comprehensive company story and credentials
_instructions.usage: Generate detailed about page showcasing company history, capabilities, and achievements
_instructions.scalability: Sections can be expanded or condensed based on company maturity and achievements

meta.title: [PROMPT] Generate SEO title: 'About {Company} - {Industry} Excellence Since {Year}' (max 60 chars)
meta.description: [PROMPT] Write meta description covering company history, expertise, and value proposition (max 160 chars)

hero.title: [PROMPT] Generate hero title ('About {Company}', 'Our Story', 'Company Overview')
hero.subtitle: [PROMPT] Create subtitle with founding year and key descriptor (e.g., 'Excellence in Manufacturing Since {Year}')
hero.description: [PROMPT] Write compelling hero description about company journey and commitment (2-3 sentences)
hero.backgroundImage: [PROMPT] Professional facility/company image from Unsplash (search: manufacturing, facility, industrial, professional building)

cta.primary: [PROMPT] Generate primary CTA ('Learn More', 'Our Services', 'View Capabilities')
cta.secondary: [PROMPT] Generate secondary CTA ('Watch Video', 'Contact Us', 'Get Quote')

companyOverview.title: [PROMPT] Generate overview title ('Company Overview', 'About Our Business', 'Who We Are')
companyOverview.subtitle: [PROMPT] Create subtitle emphasizing leadership/innovation in industry

items.content: [PROMPT] Write comprehensive company overview (3-4 sentences) covering: founding year, specialization, target industries, global reach, and key differentiators

companyJourney.title: [PROMPT] Generate journey title ('Our Journey', 'Company Timeline', 'Milestones')
companyJourney.subtitle: [PROMPT] Create subtitle about growth and achievements over time

items.title: Foundation
items.description: [PROMPT] Write founding story - vision, initial focus, founding circumstances

items.year: [PROMPT] Early expansion year (+5-10 years from founding)
items.title: [PROMPT] Expansion milestone title
items.description: [PROMPT] Describe early growth - facilities, equipment, market expansion

items.title: [PROMPT] Quality milestone title
items.description: [PROMPT] Describe quality achievements - certifications, standards implementation

items.title: [PROMPT] Market growth milestone
items.description: [PROMPT] Describe market expansion - international reach, partnerships

items.title: [PROMPT] Innovation milestone
items.description: [PROMPT] Describe recent innovations - technology upgrades, R&D initiatives

items: [PROMPT] Add 2-5 more milestones based on company history: technology upgrades, major contracts, facility expansions, award achievements, etc.

infrastructure.title: [PROMPT] Generate infrastructure title ('Our Infrastructure', 'Facilities & Equipment', 'Manufacturing Capabilities')
infrastructure.subtitle: [PROMPT] Create subtitle about advanced capabilities and precision

items.title: [PROMPT] Generate equipment category title
items.description: [PROMPT] Write detailed description of equipment capabilities and applications
items.capacity: [PROMPT] Generate capacity metric (number of machines, tonnage, etc.)

items: [PROMPT] Add 3-6 infrastructure items covering: CNC machines, testing equipment, production lines, quality labs, storage/logistics, etc.

manufacturingProcess.title: [PROMPT] Generate process title ('Manufacturing Process', 'Our Process', 'How We Work')
manufacturingProcess.subtitle: [PROMPT] Create subtitle about systematic approach and precision

items.title: [PROMPT] Material selection title
items.description: [PROMPT] Describe material selection and sourcing process

items.title: [PROMPT] Quality control title
items.description: [PROMPT] Describe quality assurance and testing procedures

items.title: [PROMPT] Finishing phase title
items.description: [PROMPT] Describe finishing and surface treatment processes

items.title: [PROMPT] Packaging/delivery title
items.description: [PROMPT] Describe packaging, documentation, and delivery process

awards.title: [PROMPT] Generate awards title ('Awards & Recognition', 'Achievements', 'Industry Recognition')
awards.subtitle: [PROMPT] Create subtitle about excellence and industry acknowledgment

items.title: [PROMPT] Generate award name relevant to industry

items: [PROMPT] Add 2-6 more awards based on company achievements: quality awards, export excellence, innovation awards, safety certifications, environmental certifications, etc.

certificates.title: [PROMPT] Generate certificates title ('Certifications & Standards', 'Quality Certifications', 'Compliance')
certificates.subtitle: [PROMPT] Create subtitle about commitment to quality and compliance
items: [PROMPT] Add more certifications based on industry: safety standards, industry-specific certifications, material certifications, etc.

cta.title: [PROMPT] Generate partnership CTA title ('Partner with Excellence', 'Join Our Success Story')
cta.subtitle: [PROMPT] Create compelling subtitle encouraging partnership/engagement

primaryCTA.text: [PROMPT] Primary action ('Start Your Project', 'Get Quote', 'Contact Us')
